name: 2017_04_humanities_student_major_824_manga
title: 2017-04-humanities-student-major_824_manga.txt
content_scrubbed:
* Ai yori Aoshi - Not so harem
* Angel Densetsu
* Baby Leaf and the sequel Honeymoon Salad
* Bakuman - More about manga and publishing than romance
* Bitter Virgin
* Bocchi na Bokura no Renai Jijou - 2 Hardheaded student
* Boku Girl - Genderbender
* Chikan Otoko - Story based on 2ch threads
* Chocotto Sister
* Choku!
* Countrouble - Same artist of Trinity-7
* Densha Otoko: Net Hatsu, Kakueki Teisha no Love Story - Also based on 2ch threads, older than Chikan Otoko
* Fujimura-kun Mates - Gag harem
* Fujiyama-san wa Shishunki
* Hajimete Datteba!
* HajiOtsu.
* Hapi Mari: Happy Marriage!? - Josei with moderate drama
* Hatsukiai
* Hatsukoi Limited. - Multiple couple
* Hazuki Kanon wa Amakunai.
* Hetakoi - Moderate drama
* Hibi Chouchou - 2 shy students
* Hitorimi Haduki-san to.
* Hoshi no Furu Machi - Moderate drama
* Ichigo 100% - Harem
* Itoshi no Karin - Short and sweet
* Kanojo ni Naru Hi & Kanojo ni Naru Hi: Another - Genderbender
* Kanojo wa Rokurokubi - Youkai school, non-battle
* Karin - Baka Vampire
* Koharu no Hibi - Yandere
* Koisome Momiji - Same artist as Yuragisou no Yuuna-san
* Kyou no Yuiko-san - Tsundere and her boyfriend
* Love Calendar - [Spoiler](/s "Bittersweet romance")
* Love Hina - harem
* Love Roma - If you don't mind the artstyle it[.] pretty good
* Mahoraba - Multiple personalities
* Midori no Hibi
* Musunde Hiraite - Multiple couple
* Natsu no Zenjitsu - Drama seinen
* Onidere
* Prunus Girl - Trap
* Re:Marina - Literally future waifu
* Senakagurashi
* Subete ni Iya Girl
* Taiyou no Ie
* Tasogare Otome x Amnesia - Horror romance
* Toshiue no Hito - Drama seinen
* Uwagaki - Sci-fi
* Yamada-kun to 7-nin no Majo
* Yandere Kanojo
* Yasashii Sekai no Tsukurikata

Edit : Glad you like Itoshi no Karin, definitely need more exposure for this manga.
